item.title: Good Things
item.description: Learning materials Teach Yourself Computer Science You need answers to these questions: Which subjects should you learn, and why? item.title: Change log
item.description: 03/05/2022 New domain: ericji.net, https complete. 03/04/2022 Buy and set a domain. 02/15/2022 Add change log, home info and social icons. 02/14/2022 Website starts with Hugo, GitHub and Netlify.

item.title: My First Post
item.description: This is my first post with Hugo! It’s great! Eric
